note.p: Burial: Parish church of St Michael, Cambridge
Education: King's College, Abeerdeen; MA (1646); Emmanuel College, Cambridge (admitted 1647); Incorporated at Oxford (1669)
Career: Fellow of Caius College, Cambridge (1653-1697); Gresham Professor of Rhetoric (1670-1676)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Hunter; Foster
